text: Mark James (born Francis Rodney Zambon; November 29, 1940 - June 8, 2024) was an American singer-songwriter and producer. He wrote hits for singers B.J. Thomas, Brenda Lee, and Elvis Presley. He wrote Presley's last US number one hit single, "Suspicious Minds."
